attributes.action: Lift visa requirements for Ukrainians while the conflict continues
attributes.additional_details: Currently, Ukrainians fleeing the country still need to obtain a visa to enter the UK. This is an impossible task as the consulates are closed, meaning that even family members and friends of British citizens from Ukraine can't come to visit them at this hour of need. The UK parliament should temporarily lift visa requirements for Ukrainians so they can seek shelter in the country. This act will help the civilian population much more than any words of comfort, hopes or prayers.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
